knimeNode.name: FilterLowExpressed
knimeNode.shortDescription: The FilterLowExpressed node can be used to filter low expressed genes before differential expression analysis.

fullDescription.intro:
The FilterLowExpressed node can be used to filter low expressed genes before differential expression analysis.
It takes as input a count table and an annotation file.
fullDescription.option: Set the minimum number of reads per sample. (default: 10)
Set the fraction of samples which must have the minimum read number. (default: 0.5)
Choose whether the conditions should be tested and be fulfilled in both cases separately. (default: true)

ports.inPort:
Row names: IDs of features.
Cell 1...n: Count of features in the samples.
The table must contain a header line with the names of the samples

Row names: Names of the samples as they are named in the count table
Cell 1: Condition (should only contain two conditions and the column should be named 'condition')
ports.outPort: The output table has the same format as the input count table, but some genes were filtered out based on the settings.
